Docs.summary: Describes global objects added to the script engine.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ExposeMembers { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ExposeMembers : bool with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the members of the global object should be made available to the script engine.
Docs.value: if public members of the global object are available to the script engine without qualification, as if they are part of the global namespace. if a member of the global object must be qualified with the object's name.
